## a.model() function

A data model that creates a matching Amazon DynamoDB table and provides create, read (list and get), update, delete, and subscription APIs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function model<T extends ModelFields>(fields: T): ModelType<{
    fields: T;
    identifier: Array<'id'>;
    secondaryIndexes: [];
    authorization: [];
}>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fields | T | database table fields. Supports scalar types and relationship types. |

**Returns:**

ModelType&lt;{ fields: T; identifier: Array&lt;'id'&gt;; secondaryIndexes: \[\]; authorization: \[\]; }&gt;

a data model definition
